roleset.name: bring shame upon
roleset.note: DISGRACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disgrace' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN; adjectival 'disgraceful' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. Comparison with 'dishonor.' Frame by Claire (from disgrace.01-v)
DISGRACEFUL-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from disgraceful.01-j)

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from Arg 0

example.name: transitive
example.text: The woman who presided over a voting failure that-1 *-1 would disgrace a banana republic has gone.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: John disgraced Mary by acting like a coward.

example.name: Adjectival rel: disgraceful
example.text: It was disgraceful and totally unacceptable .
